segments.text: I'm looking at the scene again, and I feel a profound sense of foreboding.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool is absolutely going to tip, I can feel it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is reaching too far, his balance is just too precarious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the flood from the sink continues, relentlessly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman really should be warned, but she's in her own world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a classic example of an accident waiting to happen, on multiple fronts.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost see the splash when the woman finally notices the water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the sound of the cookie jar hitting the floor, shattering.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the children's faces, so full of eager anticipation for those cookies, are quite endearing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are so blissfully unaware of the consequences, just like the woman.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a beautiful, terrible moment of pure, focused desire.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just hope everyone ends up alright after this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's so much potential for breakage and injury here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It really paints a picture of life's unpredictable moments.
segments.speaker: PAR
